text: tae aoy khnhom khlach nouv avei del puok anak thveu shi ri k yeang dauch me d chtow bae puok anak min khlach tha puok anak pitchea ban thveu shi ri k champoh a l laoh nouv avei del trong minban banhchouh phosdo tang namuoy aoy puok anak phng noh? dau che neah tae krom muoy na nei krom teangpir nih mean setthi ttuol nouv sokh sa ndi pheap cheang brasenbae puok anak ban doeng men noh
